basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Stephen H. McDonald Endowed Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Dr. Stephen H. McDonald Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education Professional Studies majoring in Early Childhood Education, Elementary Education or Library Media. Eligibility Requirements Must be majoring in early childhood education, elementary education, teaching and learning PK - 6, or library media Full time undergraduate or graduate student Minimum 3.0 GPA Student must plan on having employment within the State of Oklahoma Public School System Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
